intro: Psychotria poliostemma, commonly known as the red-eyed psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Costa Rica and Panama. The plant is characterized by its striking red flowers, which are often surrounded by dark green foliage. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is typically found in lowland rainforests. Psychotria poliostemma is also noted for its chemical composition, which includes various alkaloids.
